LanguageData.VBE_StartInsertionDesc: Bring a syrup to the soda fountain to start processing
LanguageData.VBE_CancelBringingSyrupDesc: Cancel bringing syrup to the soda fountain.
LanguageData.VBE_SyrupFailurePower: The soda has spoiled due to a power failure in the soda fountain
LanguageData.VCE_SodaFountainNotWorking: This soda fountain is not working at the moment
LanguageData.VCE_SyrupFailurePowerWarning: The syrup mix is spoiling fast due to a lack of fuel in the soda fountain
LanguageData.VBE_StartInsertionAmbMustDesc: Bring ambrandy must to the ambrandy distillery to start fermentation
LanguageData.VBE_CancelBringingAmbMustDesc: Cancel bringing ambrandy must to the ambrandy distillery.
LanguageData.VBE_AmbrandyFailurePower: The ambrandy has spoiled due to a power failure in the ambrandy distillery
LanguageData.VBE_RemoveAmbrandyDesc: Remove ambrandy from the ambrandy distillery. The ambrandy will be acquired at the present quality level ({0})
LanguageData.VCE_AmbrandyNotWorking: This ambrandy distillery is not working at the moment
LanguageData.VBE_StartInsertionMustOrWhiskeyDesc: Bring mash to the whiskey cask to start fermentation or whiskey to start double-aging process
LanguageData.VBE_CancelBringingMustOrWhiskey: Cancel bringing mash or whiskey must to the whiskey cask.
LanguageData.VCE_WhiskeyCaskNotWorking: This whiskey cask is not working at the moment
LanguageData.VBE_StartInsertionTequilaMustDesc: Bring tequila must to the tequila barrel to start fermentation process
LanguageData.VBE_CancelBringingTequilaMustDesc: Cancel bringing tequila must to the tequila barrel.
LanguageData.VCE_TequilaBarrelNotWorking: This tequila barrel is not working at the moment
LanguageData.VBE_StartInsertionVodkaMustDesc: Bring vodka mash to the vodka drum to start fermentation process
LanguageData.VBE_CancelBringingVodkaMustDesc: Cancel bringing vodka mash to the vodka drum.
LanguageData.VCE_VodkaDrumNotWorking: This vodka drum is not working at the moment
LanguageData.VBE_StartInsertionGinMushDesc: Bring gin mush to the gin still to start fermentation process
LanguageData.VBE_CancelBringingGinMushDesc: Cancel bringing gin mush to the gin still.
LanguageData.VCE_GinStillNotWorking: This gin still is not working at the moment
LanguageData.VBE_MushCurrentlyFrozen: This mush is frozen and will not ripen into ambrandy must
LanguageData.VBE_MushCurrentlyRefrigerated: This mush is refrigerated and will not ripen into ambrandy must as fast as it could (ripens in {0})
LanguageData.VBE_MushDryingCorrectly: This mush is ripening into ambrandy must correctly (ripens in {0})
LanguageData.VBE_CiderCurrentlyFrozen: This unfermented cider is frozen and will not mature into cider
LanguageData.VBE_CiderCurrentlyRefrigerated: This unfermented cider is refrigerated and will not mature into cider as fast as it could (matures in {0})
LanguageData.VBE_CiderMaturingCorrectly: This unfermented cider is maturing into cider correctly (matures in {0})
LanguageData.VBE_HomeAreaDesc: Only unforbid automatically dropped fruit if the tree is in the home area
